<LI>Hold the mouse over the dots to see the places associated with
This will highlight an entry in the place-name list. You can click on the dots or the name in the
place-name list to display the entry of the place of interest. The
can be clicked to go to a detailed map, courtesy of Streetmap.co.uk.
